original_title: Sam and Phil: Journey Across the Galaxy ACT 1
overview: Brothers, Sam and Phil team up with other humans, Yuri and Steve to help them collect items called Moon Shards hidden around the depths of the galaxy, to help the brothers return to Earth to find their parents. While on their journey, they will discover secrets of a long-winded past that lied within the stars...
title: Sam and Phil: Journey Across the Galaxy ACT 1
